entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 10:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

Humidity: 69 %

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 10 with temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High 10 with temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 20 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 70 gusting to 90 near Bowen Island late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
